search.description: Find your friends! You may search by trainer name or by trainer id.

profile.title: User #{{profileId}} Public Profile
profile.description: This feature is in BETA. Pokebattler profiles are now shareable. For now, all you can do is show your friends the pokemon that you have but more to come!

meta.description: View the public profile for User #{{profileId}}. See what pokemon {{name || 'he'}} is using
